\usepackage{amsmath, amsthm, amssymb}

\renewcommand{\underline}[1]{{\bf{#1}}}
\newcommand{\cprob}[2]{\text{Pr}\left(#1 \,|\,#2\right)}
\newcommand{\prob}[1]{\text{Pr}\left(#1 \right)}
\newcommand{\cexpect}[4]{\text{E}\left#3 #1 \,|\,#2\right#4}
\newcommand{\expect}[3]{\text{E}\left#2 #1 \right#3}

\newcommand{\fder}[1]{\frac{d}{d #1}}
\newcommand{\hder}[2]{\frac{d^{#2}}{d {#1}^{#2}}}
\newcommand{\fpart}[1]{\frac{\partial}{\partial #1}}
\newcommand{\hpart}[2]{\frac{\partial^{#2}}{\partial {#1}^{#2}}}
\newcommand{\iid}{\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}}
\newcommand{\indfun}[1]{1_{\{#1\}}}
\newcommand{\notation}{\overset{\text{def}}{=}}
\newcommand{\asarrow}{\overset{\text{a.s.}}{\rightarrow}}
\newcommand{\parrow}{\overset{\text{P}}{\rightarrow}}
\newcommand{\darrow}{\overset{\text{D}}{\rightarrow}}
\newcommand{\mydef}{\overset{\text{def}}{=}}

\DeclareMathOperator*{\argmax}{arg\,max}
\DeclareMathOperator*{\argmin}{arg\,min}
